item.title: Shape Shifter: Formations
item.description: Game Description Shape Shifter: Formations - This is an exciting two -osti shooter with Rogue -Lite mechanics, which brings a fresh stream in the genre. In this game, gamers have to fight with the waves of geometric enemies, passing through tense scenarios of bullet adhesive hell. Whether it is a single flight or a local cooperative with a friend, Adventure offers a number of tests that will check reflexes and strategic thinking.

item.title: Velocity Rift
item.description: Game Description Velocity Rift puts a player for driving a vehicle with a view of the top, setting him the task of competing on tracks located on a secluded island. A single gameplay is built around 3 separate game modes, each of which has its own rules and conditions for victory. Promotion on these diverse competitions requires a constant concentration from the racer to pass complicated routes and maneuvers of computer opponents.

item.title: Gruel
item.description: Game Description Gruel - this is an exciting first -person shooter in which chaos reigns in the endless arena. Users move around the unpredictable temple, faced with a series of constantly changing rooms filled with bizarre enemies. Each step forward is a new challenge that makes reflexes and adapt to the limit. Traditional shooting mechanics fades into the background, and improvisation becomes a key point. Movement is constantly, fluctuations lead to disaster, and the only way out is a passage.

item.title: Ratshaker
item.description: Game Description Ratshaker stands out with its non -standard approach to the genre of pest combat. Unlike typical games, in which strategies or battle are given the main attention, this one goes along a rather unusual path: the gamer has to subjugate a virtual rat. The process is simple, but strangely exciting: shake the rat, watch how the submission counter is growing, and continue to shake until you finish the work.

item.title: Kill Knight
item.description: Game Description Kill Knight paves his way to the arena of action-players, promising a cruel ballet from trials and strategy. Fasten the belts because this adventure throws you into a deep abyss - quick reflexes and acute thinking - your only life circles. Forget about sitting aside and interrupting enemies one by one. Here the aggressive style of the game is encouraged, but do not shoot with a fright. Resource management is a key point.

item.title: Pinball Spire
item.description: Game Description Pinball Spire challenges the world, combining the classic pinball mechanics with elements of research and development for a unique adventure. You take control of a pee, a brave character, whose determination plays a key role - both in the plot and in how you play. The essence of Pinball Spire is to manage a mysterious spire that suddenly appeared in the world of a pipa. This is not an ordinary pinball table.

item.title: Kakatte Koi Yo!
item.description: Game Description kakatte koi yo! - This is a two -dimensional action platform with the possibility of local multiplayer. This is a real catâ€™s battle, in which you have to take control of powerful cats and master even more powerful fish to defeat your opponents in a fierce 2D platform battle. This game with charming aesthetics in the Japanese style and irresistibly cute characters is an obligatory game for any cat lover.
